item.title: Android Internet Connection Receiver

item.title: Android Key Hashes & SHA1
item.description: Android Key Hashes & SHA1 Windows komut satÄ±rÄ±na aÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki komutu yazarak ulaÅŸabilirsiniz. keytool -exportcert -alias androiddebugkey -keystore %HOMEPATH%\.android\debug.keystore | openssl sha1 -binary | openssl base64 openssl hatasÄ± alÄ±rsanÄ±z https://code.google.com/p/openssl-for-windows/downloads/detail?name=openssl-0.9.8k_X64.zip adresindeki dosyayÄ± indirdikten sonra Ã§Ä±kan dosyadaki bin klasÃ¶rÃ¼nÃ¼ ortam deÄŸiÅŸkenlerindeki PATH kÄ±smÄ±na eklerseniz sorun ortadan kalkacaktÄ±r. Ortam deÄŸiÅŸkenlerine ulaÅŸmak iÃ§in : Denetim MasasÄ± > Sistem > GeliÅŸmiÅŸ SÄ°stem AyarlarÄ± SHA1 ulaÅŸmak iÃ§in komut satÄ±rÄ±na aÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki kodu yazmanÄ±z yeterli olacaktÄ±r. your_user_name yerine kendi kullanÄ±cÄ± adÄ±nÄ±zÄ± yazmayÄ± unutmayÄ±n.

String.xml <string name="pazartesi">Pazartesi</string> <string name="sali">SalÄ±</string> <string name="carsamba">Ã‡arÅŸamba</string> <string name="persembe">PerÅŸembe</string> <string name="cuma">Cuma</string> <string name="cumartesi">Cumartesi</string> <string name="pazar">Pazar</string> <string-array name="array_gonderi_list_haftalik"> <item>@string/pazartesi</item> <item>@string/sali</item> <item>@string/carsamba</item> <item>@string/persembe</item> <item>@string/cuma</item> <item>@string/cumartesi</item> <item>@string/pazar</item> </string-array> SpinnerHelper.
